WingRazor Nodded. "Yes i can, but becareful." "WingRazor... 
MAXIMIZE!" She transformed and her graceful, but intemidating eagle 
form loomed over windlord.
**************

The Pod began humming as the bio scan began to emerge and scan the 
area... Soon a suitable form was found and the pod hissed as it 
opened... A male bot looked up rubbing its head. "Argh... Whatsss 
going on?" "Where am I?" "Who are you?" He shook his head stepping 
out he was at least seven feet tall his arms and legs were strangely 
slim and long. "He stopped as his eternal systems began 
churning... "NightViper... i am NightViper... Predicon?" He flexed as 
his heart shaped body shined with a scale like design work, a "u" 
like design was across his back, his head was shaped flat and his 
eyes were thin and small while he had no visible mouth, his hands 
were griping claws, and his feet appeared to be split cone like 
appendages... He reached behind his back drawing a crossbow. "Alright 
Namesss, and alliancesss?" His eyes glowed red as the pred logo was 
emblazed on his chest...
